default: 1 pheasant breast, skinned and sliced into strips
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the butter in a frying pan and add the strips of pheasant breast. Cook over a medium heat for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally, until lightly browned on all sides.
Add the cream and bring to the boil. Stir in the mustard, rosemary, salt and freshly ground black pepper and simmer for a few minutes.
Remove the rosemary sprig and stir in the chives.
title: Pan-fried pheasant breast with creamy mustard sauce
